SYSTEM: Metodolog%C3%ADa-2-v2.pdf: Página 23
Reusing Ontology Statements. 
Ontology Statement Integration
gy
g
The question here is: how to reuse the selected ontology
statements.
There are three modes:
 Import the selected ontology statements.
 Copy the selected ontology statements.
 Map the selected ontology statements.
After reusing an ontology statement, the following work must
g
gy
,
g
be probably done:
 changing names (concepts, properties) to adapt them to the
naming conventions used in the ontology network being
g
gy
g
developed.
 adding range in properties; and changing cardinalities.
 restrictions should be added too
 restrictions should be added too.
 check local inconsistencies in the ontology network.
